===Etymology===
Short for {{zh-l|沙河粉}}. ''Shahe fen'' is believed to have originated in the town of [[Shahe District|Shahe]] ({{zh-l|沙河}}, Shāhé), now part of the [[Tianhe District]] in the city of [[Guangzhou]], in the southern Chinese province of [[Guangdong]], whence the name derives.
